title: Detox in a Box - Homeopathic - Collaborative Natural Health Partners
description: Detox-in-a-Box Homeopathic by Apple A Day is a kit which aims to promote detoxification.* This 2-step combination of liquid homeopathic remedies is formulated to optimize drainage pathways in the body.* This is a great addition to detox protocols to support toxin elimination and cleansing processes.* *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent disease.
